I have been updating some of my [themes for the Xaringan slide system](https://agrogan1.github.io/R/xaringan-themes/).

Below, please find--as an example--my theme based upon University of Michigan colors.

```{r}

embed_xaringan(url = "https://agrogan1.github.io/R/xaringan-themes/MichiganTest.html",
               ratio = "4:3")

```
